display.text1: The API is used to get current information of a generated report that is available to your account.
display.url_params_help: You are required to specify all these params in order to get a valid response.
display.source_help: The source parameter accepts the name of the source of details. (ex: instagram )

display.failed_response_help: Here is how a failed request response will look like.
